{{elements|Cl|{{ja-r|硫%黄|い%おう}}|S|{{ja-r|アルゴン}}|Ar|lang=ja|sort=えんそ}}
{{wikipedia|lang=ja}}
===Etymology===
{{m|ja|塩||salt|tr=en}} + {{m|ja|素||chemical element|tr=so}}. From the fact that it is a main ingredient of table salt

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|acc=a|y=o|えんそ}}
===Noun===
{{ja-noun|えんそ}}

# [[chlorine]], [[Cl]]

====Derived terms====
{{der-top}}
* {{l|ja|塩素ガス中毒}} (''enso gasu chūdoku''): chloride gas poisoning
* {{l|ja|塩素水}} (''ensosui''): chlorine water
* {{l|ja|塩素爆鳴気}} (''enso-bakumeiki''): chlorine detonating gas
* {{l|ja|塩素酸}} (''ensosan''): chloric acid
{{der-mid}}
* {{l|ja|塩素酸カリウム}} (''ensosan kariumu''): potassium chlorate
* {{l|ja|塩素酸ナトリウム}} (''ensosan natoriumu''): sodium chlorate
* {{l|ja|塩素酸塩}} (''enso-san'en''): chlorate
{{der-bottom}}
